snippet: Novak Djokovic dominated both tiebreakers to beat Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, 7-6 (2), 7-6 (2), and reach the semifinals of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic dominated both tiebreakers to beat Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, 7-6 (2), 7-6 (2), and reach the semifinals of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal Advance at Indian Wells

abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Jo-Wilfried Tsonga and Rafael Nadal beats Kei Nishikori to qualify for semifinals of BNP Paribas Open.
